title: 006 - Former #2 Overall Pick Of The 1998 NFL Draft Ryan Leaf & Stand-Up Comedian Al Jackson Join The Pod
description: On today's show, the guys are joined by former #2 pick of the San Diego Chargers and former Quarterback of the Chargers, Cowboys, Buccaneers, and Seahawks, a man who has turned his life around and is now thriving, Ryan Leaf. Also joining the guys is one of the cohosts of The Daily Blast Live, stand-up comedian and friend of the office, Al Jackson. Ryan, Al and the guys dive into just about everything imaginable ranging from Ryan's struggle and eventual resurgence, the differences between the way booze and drugs are accepted, what the best pizza chain is, an update on the Coronavirus, what TV shows everyone is most embarrassed to watch are, and Al finishes things off with a hilarious story about his Instagram handle. Strap in, this is a fun one. Enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
